Object.Name: IPSO Power Control
Object.Description1: Description: This Object is used to control a power source, such as a Smart Plug. It allows a power relay to be turned on or off and its dimmer setting to be control as a % between 0 and 100.

Item.Name: On/Off
Item.Description: This resource represents a power relay, which can be controlled, the setting of which is a Boolean value (1,0) where 1 is on and 0 is off.

Item.Name: Dimmer
Item.Description: This resource represents a power dimmer setting, which has an Integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.

Item.Name: On Time
Item.Description: The time in seconds that the power relay has been on. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

Item.Name: Cumulative active power
Item.Description: The total power in Wh that has been used by the load.

Item.Name: Power factor
Item.Description: The power factor of the load.
